document_data.name: Instant Regeneration
document_data.mainbody: '''''Instant regeneration''''' was a powerful [[spell]] commonly used by [[wu jen]] in [[Kara-Tur]]. The spell was very rare outside Kara-Tur.
document_data.Effects: Using this spell, a wu jen was able to instantly regenerate a severed limp. The spell was only able to regenerate an existing appendage, it was unable to create a new one. The wu jen experienced no discomfort from the effects of the spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a piece of yellow [[paper]] with red writing.
